name: Grim Harvest (automatonvx)
description:
Grim Harvest

You are a cursed creature, doomed to scavenge around the graveyard feasting on the remains of the recently deceased. The patrol men are wise to your game. Your days are numbered, how many will you last?

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys 

E /Left Mouse Click - Dig

Space Bar / Right Click to swing your weapon when you have one
